text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If you're lookin' for an emcee, look<n>no further than me: the<n>
silver-tongued, world's<n>strongest—ELLLL CONDOR<n>
PASAAAAA!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I think El's conjuring the<n>wrong type of emcee for
this, but...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! I grant you the right to hear<n>my inspirational
words! Be grateful!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
...On second thought, this concert<n>celebrates all of us.
Perhaps it would<n>be more appropriate to express my<n>
individuality as well.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to try leading the audience<n>in a final clap to end
the festivities. ♪

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
So, um, the next song is... Hehe, hehe!<n>Ah no! I laughed
again!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Urara? Have I missed something?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I was just thinking of how big and full<n>of fun this concert is
going to be, and it<n>made me so excited, I started<n>laughing
during my emcee speech.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In that case, you've no need to<n>withhold your laughter! The
audience<n>came to see you, meaning it is<n>unnecessary that
you force a<n>performative persona!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Really?! I see! Then I can be an<n>emcee who laughs all the
time!
